I.name: Power Chord
description:
{{sbc|Innate - Accelerando:}} '''Sona''' generates a stack of ''Accelerando'' each time she hits an enemy with ''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona}}'' or supports an ally with ''{{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona}}'', which stacks up to 120 times. If she has maximum stacks, she instead {{sti|cdr|reduces}} the cooldown of ''{{ai|Crescendo|Sona}}'' by {{fd|1.5}} seconds each time.

[[File:Power Chord.png|20px|border|link=]] {{sbc|Accelerando:}} For each stack, '''Sona''' gains {{sti|ah|{{fd|0.5}}}} [[Ability_haste#Increasing_basic_ability_haste|basic ability haste]], up to a maximum of 60.

{{sbc|Innate - Melody:}} '''Sona's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] incur {{sti|cd|{{fd|0.5}}-second}} global cooldown on her other basic abilities, and cause her to generate a unique [[aura]] for 3 seconds that empowers herself and nearby allied champions.

{{sbc|Innate - Power Chord:}} '''Sona's''' basic abilities generate a stack of ''Power Chord'', which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, her next [[basic attack]] consumes them all to become empowered with an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, deal {{as|{{pp|20 to 90 for 8;90 to 240|formula=10 + 10 per level until level 8, then + 15 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, and apply an additional effect based on the last basic ability cast.
Gaining ''Power Chord's'' empowered attack {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Sona's''' basic attack timer.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Accelerando: Sona generates a stack of Accelerando each time she hits an enemy with Sona's Hymn of Valor or supports an ally with Sona's Aria of Perseverance, which stacks up to 120 times. If she has maximum stacks, she instead reduces the cooldown of Sona's Crescendo by 1.5 seconds each time.

File:Power Chord.png Accelerando: For each stack, Sona gains 0.5 Ability_haste#Increasing_basic_ability_haste, up to a maximum of 60.
Innate - Melody: Sona's basic Champion ability incur 0.5-second global cooldown on her other basic abilities, and cause her to generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers herself and nearby allied champions.
Innate - Power Chord: Sona's basic abilities generate a stack of Power Chord, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, her next basic attack consumes them all to become empowered with an uncancellable windup, deal 20 − 90 for 8;90 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the last basic ability cast.
Gaining Power Chord's empowered attack resets Sona's basic attack timer.
I.notes:
* '''Sona''' has a stack counter under her health-bar that is not visible to other champions.
** When ''Power Chord'' is ready, Sona gains a ring around her. This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used (''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona|blue}}, {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|green}} or {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona|purple}}'').
** The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* '''Sona''' retains ''Power Chord's'' stacks when entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The empowered attack will trigger but not be consumed nor apply its effects against [[ward]]s.

Q.name: Hymn of Valor
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal {{as|magic damage}} and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of ''{{ai|Power Chord|Sona|Accelerando}}'' for each bolt that hits an enemy {{tip|champion}}.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona|Melody|image=*none*}} Bonus:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord 2|Sona|Power Chord}} – Staccato:}} ''Power Chord'' deals {{as|{{pp|20*1.4 to 90*1.4 for 8;90*1.4 to 240*1.4|formula=14 + 14 per level until level 8, then + 21 per level}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 28% AP)}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}}.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of Sona's Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy champion.
Sona's Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.
Sona's Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals 20*1.4 − 90*1.4 for 8;90*1.4 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.
Q.notes:
* The sight is granted of the targets on-cast.
* The empowered attack will trigger but not be consumed against [[ward]]s.

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 20% AP)

W.name: Aria of Perseverance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' {{tip|heals}} herself and sends out a tone to heal the {{tt|most wounded|Based on greatest % missing health}} allied champion nearby.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona|Melody|image=*none*}} Bonus:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions receive a {{tip|shield}} lasting up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
'''Sona''' gains a stack of ''{{ai|Power Chord|Sona|Accelerando}}'' whenever she {{tip|heals}} a wounded ally or {{tip|shields}} a minimum amount of damage for an ally with ''Aria of Perseverance''.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord 2|Sona|Power Chord}} – Diminuendo:}} ''Power Chord'' reduces the target's [[size]] by 8% and damage output by 25% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 3 seconds.
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.
Sona's Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
Sona gains a stack of Sona's Accelerando whenever she heals a wounded ally or shields a minimum amount of damage for an ally with Aria of Perseverance.
Sona's Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces the target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.
W.notes:
* If no one is injured, ''Aria of Perseverance'' will target the closest allied champion.
* The projectile of ''Aria of Perseverance'' will follow an ally in stealth but will not reveal them.

E.name: Song of Celerity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' gains {{as|20%|ms}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds, which is extended to up to 7 seconds if she does not take damage during this time.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona|Melody|image=*none*}} Bonus:}} Tagged allied champions gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 3 seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord 2|Sona|Power Chord}} – Tempo:}} ''Power Chord'' {{tip|slows}} the target by 40% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, which is extended to up to 7 seconds if she does not take damage during this time.
Sona's Melody Bonus: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Sona's Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord slows the target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
leveling: {{st|Aura Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10 to 14}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}}}}
E.notes: * To achieve a 99% {{tip|slow}} with the empowered attack via {{ai|Power Chord|Sona}}, it would require at least {{as|1475 AP}}.

effects.str: • Aura Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 2% per 100 AP)

R.name: Crescendo
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, which {{tip|stuns}} and forces them to dance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
R.descriptionHtml: Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, which stuns and forces them to dance for 1.5 seconds.
